name: Dracula's noon
description:
This game  was created as entry for Trijam #39 A 3 hour game jam.

Dracula was forced to flee from his lair. His enemies are close. Help him escape as far as he can from both his enemies and from the deadly sun. 

Use arrows to move left and right.

This game uses font Bitmgothic Font by Nomi

The bat is editet version of https://opengameart.org/content/flappy-bat
